explains: vt. 束缚；征服；使某人成为奴隶

sentences.en: I'd die myself before I'd let anyone enslave your folk ever again.
sentences.cn: 我死也不会让任何人再奴役你们。

sentences.en: If so, why don't we think it's acceptable to enslave people with low IQs?
sentences.cn: 如果能，为什么我们无法接受奴役低智商人群的行为呢？

sentences.en: Your habits are a servant, and they will enslave you or free you.You choose by using your will power what they do.
sentences.cn: 你的习惯是你忠实的仆人，你只需要用你的意念选择你想让他们做的事。
